channel.title: Florian Tramer on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Florian Tramer on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Linking Anonymous Transactions via Remote Side-Channel Attacks
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230214874908655617 paper: https://crypto.stanford.edu/timings/paper.pdf Introduction This is going to be talking about linking anonymous transactions in zcash and monero. Thanks for the introduction. I am going to be talking about remote side-channel attacks on anonymous transactions. This will be with respect to zcash and monero. Full disclosure, we disclosed all of the things I am talking about here today and everything has been fixed. No need to worry. This is joint work with Dan Boneh and Kenny Paterson.
